resources.string: Add file sources using the menu item above.
Automatically check the \"Delete file\" option when removing a movie or TV show episode.
Always delete file when removing content
Automatically share social updates when you watch a movie or TV show.
Press the Back-button to navigate up the file system
Set the buffer size of the video streaming service.
"You can't manually identify while the library is updating!"
Which kind of content are you going to add?
Creates a copy of the database in the application folder.
Why not add some? It\'s easy to do.
No IP address or host name!
Something went wrong - please try again!
This may take a few moments…
These folders will be indexed for content
Finished synchronizing TV shows with Trakt
This folder has no files or folders.
Anonymously share filenames in order to improve filename recognition in future versions.
Include adult titles when searching for movies.
Android Google+ like floating action button which reacts on the list view scrolling events. Becomes visible when the list view is scrolled up and invisible when scrolled down.
Mizuu will start shortly. This may take a few minutes…
"Connection failed. Make sure you're connected to a network!"
"It seems like there aren't any actors…"
It happens to the best of us…
Select Update library from the menu to add movies.
Select the Update icon from the menu to add movies.
Nothing has happened in the last nine months.
Please try again with a different query.
Select Update library from the menu to add TV shows.
Select the Update icon from the menu to add TV shows.
Good job! Check out the Online Movies section to discover new movies.
Change the size of movie and TV show covers in the overviews.
Configure the file sources to include in library updates.
Enable movie and show titles in library overview.
Nothing has aired in the last three months.
Select a file to manually identify.
Use a grid or list view to display TV show episodes.
Localize movie and TV show information into selected language. Defaults to English.
Make file location(s) visible in the movie and TV show details view.
Stopping update… This may take a short while.
Select which section to show at launch.
Show newest or oldest episodes first.
Show newest or oldest seasons first.
The update process runs in the background and may take up to several minutes. It can be cancelled from the notification drawer.
